title: An Analysis of Tommy Wilhelm's tragic life in Saul Bellow's seize the day
abstract: In this thesis,the writer wants to talk about the tragic life of Tommy Wilhelm in Saul Bellow's Seize the Day,In discussing Wilhelm's failure,she analyses the factor that bring his downfall,both external and internal factors. In discussing external factors,the writer analyses why and how the society where he lives contributes his downfall,why and how his relationship with his "best" friend.Dr.Tamkin also brings his downfall.In discussing internal factors,the writer analyzes Wilhelm's weaknesses that bring his downfall.In these factors,she analyses in detail why Wilhelm's foolishness,indolence,dependent and sentimental feeling bring his downfall.
contributors: Josefa Juniarti Mardijono (Advisor 2); DANIEL LABERGE, BA OF ARTS (Examination Committee 1)
subjects: AMERICAN FICTION-20TH CENTURY-STUDY AND TEACHING; BELLOW, SAUL, 1915-....-SEIZE THE DAY-STUDY AND TEACHING
